title: HOLE
description:
HOLE is a low-resolution, gun jamming , single-player FPS. This is a small but hard gunfight. Let’s clear jam with swearing. Sunset Motel
Play time 5 to 30 minutes per stage. No time limit. Assume 2-3 hours to unlock all stages (3 in total).
Recommended for Who do not have a lot of time to play, but want to enjoy hard fps Who want to enjoy fps casually without fear of losing equipment. Who want to play small single-player fps
Cautions No story. There is no “clear” in the stage . Enemies spawn infinitely. There are 3 stages in total. You can challenge only one at the beginning . There are 4 guns in total. You can use only one at the beginning.
How to play Access the floating microwave oven and jump into the hole. The stage is full of dangers . Try to stay alive. When you want to return home, find the microwave oven again and jump into the hole .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti with Max-Q design
